availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel H. Patterson (Clark Co., IN (Jeffersonville), state prison superintendent )

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, superintendent of state prison. Tennessee native. Married to Sarah A. Nowland Patterson. Father of James N. Patterson, Mary Patterson, Matthias Patterson, and Leviston Patterson. Superintendent of the state prison in Jeffersonville, Indiana, in 1850. Resident of Jeffersonville in 1860. Employed Margaret McBaron, Mary McBaron, and Elizabeth Swimp as domestic servants in Jeffersonville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Jeffersonville, p. 158B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Jeffersonville, p. 424-25.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #11137.
"Samuel H. Patterson (1806-1889)," Find A Grave, Memorial #63161503, accessed August 11, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/63161503.
